cmd.name: foraging
cmd.description: Every 15 seconds restores the food of all units by 2 (3 for the caster's).\nIt lasts 45 seconds

cmd.name: wisdom
cmd.description: Increases the level of all units by 1 and the experience by another 5 for the caster's (up to level 30).\nIt takes 20 seconds

cmd.name: soothing
cmd.description: Every 5 seconds restores the stamina of all units by 5 (10 for the caster's).\nIt lasts 30 seconds

cmd.name: sacrifice
cmd.description: Every 4 seconds deals 40 damage to all sages (20 for the caster's).\nIt lasts 1 minute

cmd.name: gold_rain
cmd.description: Every 3 seconds adds 10 gold to all settlements (15 for the caster's).\nIt lasts 2 minutes

cmd.name: plague
cmd.description: Poisons 1 in every 7 units (8 for the caster's).\nIt has a 1 minute cooldown

cmd.name: bloodlust
cmd.description: Allows all warriors to ignore enemy armor and those of the caster present at the time of the activation gain 4 bonus damage for the duration.\nLasts 90 seconds

cmd.name: starvation
cmd.description: Every 5 seconds decreases the food of all settlements and caravans by 2% and 20 (1% and 10 for the caster's).\nLasts 2 minutes

cmd.name: earthquake
cmd.description: Every second deals 300 damage to all strongholds (225 to the caster's).\nLasts 10 seconds

cmd.name: teuton_horde
cmd.description: Gathers a level 12 (18 for the caster) horde of 100 Teutons (40 riders, 40 archers and 20 wolves) in all strongholds, depleting their population.\nIt takes 3 minutes
